title: Game Scoop! 698: Spoiler-Free God of War Ragnarok Opinions
description:
Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Justin Davis, and Jada Griffin -- are discussing God of War Ragnarok, PSVR2, early '80s games, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.

000:00:00 - God of War Ragnarok Spoiler-free Opinions

00:25:29 - PSVR2

00:36:22 - The November 1982 issue of Electronic Fun with Computers and Games

01:02:20 - Video Game 20 Questions
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (Daemon Hatfield, Justin Davis, Jada Griffin, Samuel Claiborn)
